articles.title: Okta (OKTA): Revisiting Valuation After Recent Share Price Strength
articles.mainIdea: Okta (OKTA): Revisiting Valuation After Recent Share Price Strength
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: Okta (OKTA): Revisiting Valuation After Recent Share Price Strength. Okta (OKTA) has been quietly grinding higher, with the stock up around 16% over the past month even as the past 3 months have been roughly flat. That move has investors revisiting its valuation. See our latest analysis for Okta. Zooming out, Okta’s roughly 15 percent year to date share price return signals that sentiment is slowly improving as investors reassess both its growth runway and security risk profile following earlier execution concerns.
